alert.note: Alert for Grand Valley; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 3:22PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Mesa County through 345 PM MDT... At 322 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fruita, or 12 miles west of Grand Junction, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fruita. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 16 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Grand Valley; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
